title: Bleach Swordsman of Kusajishi - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Fanfiction   Male Protagonist   Multiple Realms   Overpowered Protagonist   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Tian Nan's Panties   天南的小裤裤
description:
An otaku found himself stranded in a dense forest, which turns out to be part of Soul Society.

Yes, the Soul Society in the anime that he once watched, Bleach.

But… he doesn’t have any cheat!

How does he plan to fight the enemies like Aizen or Yhwach in the future?>
